com.jaunt

Class JNodes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaunt.JNode
      • com.jaunt.JNodes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<JNode>

    public class JNodes
extends JNode
    A List-like container of JNodes (JSON Nodes), used to represent a JSON array.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.jaunt.JNode

        TYPE_ARRAY, TYPE_BOOLEAN, TYPE_NUMBER, TYPE_OBJECT, TYPE_STRING, TYPE_UNDEFINED

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JNode get(int index)
      Returns the JNode at the specified position or throws a NotFound Exception if the specified position is out of bounds.
      Iterator<JNode> iterator()
      Returns an Iterator over the JNodes contained within this JNodes container.
      int size()
      Returns the number of child JNodes.
      List<JNode> toList()
      Returns the child JNodes as a List.
      String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the JNodes container.
